Nonlinearity
==============================================================


```{r}

# Evaluate Nonlinearity
# component + residual plot 
crPlots(fit)
# Ceres plots 
ceresPlots(fit)

# Non-independence of Errors
# Test for Autocorrelated Errors
durbinWatsonTest(fit)
```
